alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sublette County through 245 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Half Moon Lake, or 8 miles northeast of Pinedale, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fremont Lake around 220 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pinedale and Willow Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
